attributes.action: Tell us how many dishonourable electeds have even the slightest financial link to any of the companies building our aircraft carriers.
attributes.additional_details: There seems to be absolutely nothing that is going wrong in our financial affairs that can be fixed by our dishonourable electeds.  Could that be because they have links which means they benefit when contracts are extended or budget costs increase.  It is simply not a natural state of affairs to not be able to put right at least some of those things which are going wrong, unless it's because they have a personal financial interest in it not being put right.
